channel.title: Making on Özlem Yönder Prints
channel.description: Recent content in Making on Özlem Yönder Prints

item.title: Printing the daisies at night
item.description: Printing the daisies (bellis perennis) at a night session.

item.title: Printing the daisies at night
item.description: Printing the daisies (bellis perennis) at a night session.

item.title: Carving with a baby
item.description: I did have some back pain after this carving session, but it’s worth it—meeting both of our needs. Baby needs to be close to mama, and mama needs to carve her latest creation!

item.title: Product photography
item.description: Here’s how I photograph my prints! Photography may not be my strength, but I make do by chasing the elusive sun in cloudy Bochum.

item.title: Printing women who runs with the wolves
item.description: Test prints of “women who runs with the wolves”. I made this print back in 2022 after reading the book by Clarissa Pinkola Estés.

item.title: Logo in the making
item.description: I created a logo for my printing journey, inspired by Linden, who encourages me to learn and grow alongside him.
